New Records: India scored the highest total of 196 runs in Antigua in this match
Kuldeep Yadav claimed 4 wickets for 19 runs, the best figures for India in the tournament so far
Key Match Events: Bangladesh captain Najmul Shanto's poor decision to bowl first
Hardik Pandya played a crucial 50* off 27 balls
Virat Kohli and Rishabh Pant contributed significantly with the bat
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh was given a golden opportunity at the toss but chose to bowl first
The pitch was expected to get progressively slower but India adjusted well
Post-Match Reflections: India's win put them in a strong position for the semi-finals
Bangladesh's loss left them on the brink of elimination
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was India's most complete performance so far in the tournament
Tanzid Hasan Shakib and Rishad Hossain were the standout bowlers for Bangladesh
Others: The match was played on June 22, 2024, in Antigua
